attributes.action: Stop using the Scottish Highlands as a nuclear playground
attributes.additional_details: Caithness does not have the infrastructure to deal with this operation, the roads are extremely unsuitable. Leaving county residents wide open, not only terrorist attacks but to accidental leakage from the waste itself! The weapons grade nuclear material will be used to kill thousands, blood that will be on all our hands if we continue to allow this to happen! The waste itself is worth billions of dollars! highlanders are having their lives played with, it's a disaster waiting to happen!
attributes.background: Currently nuclear material stored at Dounreay nuclear facility is being transported to America by plane from a small airport in Wick, this not only poses a giant health risk to those in the area, but will be used to make nuclear weapons once on American soil. All lives matter! Let's stop this now!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
